title: Identifying the charge storage mechanism in polyimide anodes for Na-ion aqueous batteries by impedance spectroscopy
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,874-882
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00037D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Raphael L. Streng, Sergei Vagin, Yuejie Guo, Bernhard Rieger, Aliaksandr S. Bandarenka
This work proposes a new electrochemical impedance model for the redox mechanism of polyimide anodes in aqueous Na-ion batteries. It provides key insights into the discrepancy between experimental and theoretical specific capacities.
